00030     class Socket : public Frame {
00031 
00032      public:
00033 
00034         Socket( string host, string protocol )
00035         {
00036             _info = getInfo( "www.sun.com", "http" );
00037 
00038             _socket = socket( _info->ai_family, _info->ai_socktype, _info->ai_protocol );
00039             cout << "socket = " << _socket << endl;
00040 
00041             int result = ::connect( _socket, _info->ai_addr, _info->ai_addrlen );
00042             cout << "connect = " << result << endl;
00043             
00044             freeaddrinfo( _info );
00045         }
00046 
00047         void initSlots()
00048         {
00049             //setSlot( Symbol::at( "test" ), new Method<Object>( &Object::_test ) );
00050             //setSlot( Symbol::at( "set-slot" ), new Method<Object>( &Object::_setSlot_ ) );
00051         }
00052 
00053         string inspect() { return "[Socket]"; }
00054 
00055         addrinfo* getInfo( string host, string protocol )
00056         {
00057             addrinfo hints;
00058             memset( &hints, 0, sizeof( hints ) );
00059             hints.ai_family   = AF_UNSPEC;
00060             hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00061             
00062             int result = getaddrinfo( host.c_str(), protocol.c_str(), &hints, &_info );
00063             cout << "getaddrinfo = " << result << endl;
00064             
00065             return _info;
00066         }
00067 
00068         void send( const char* data )
00069         {
00070             int result = ::send( _socket, data, strlen( data ), 0 );
00071             cout << "send = " << result << endl;
00072         }
00073 
00074         void send( const void* data, int length )
00075         {
00076             int result = ::send( _socket, (char*) data, length, 0 );
00077             cout << "send = " << result << endl;
00078         }
00079 
00080         string receive()
00081         {
00082             char buffer[4096];
00083             
00084             int length = ::recv( _socket, buffer, 4095, 0 );
00085             cout << "recv = " << length << endl;
00086             buffer[length] = '\0';
00087             
00088             return buffer;
00089         }
00090

00092

00099             END( "" );

00104         Value _setSlot_( Array& args, Value self )
